quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
author: Rumi

quote: Thinking is the capital, Enterprise is the way, Hard Work is the solution.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.
author: Emo Philips

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
author: John Johnson

quote: A good laugh heals a lot of hurts.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
author: Matt Mullenweg

quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
author: Steve Martin
